评论详情: I’m just shy of 6’ and about 150 lbs. Purchased the XL for the length and was not disappointed. Have been dreaming of these overalls my whole life; not an exaggeration. The material is thin and airy. As you can see in the video, movement is not restricted (Highly encourage moving in these beautiful new digs). So cute and fun! I am pumped to wear these all summer long. In the video I have leggings on underneath and no one would be the wiser, so I can rock them in cooler weather too!
